acf.description:
We’ve been working to figure out how we can keep trivia going during this unprecedented time—so join us on Tuesday, April 14 at 7:30pm as we experiment with our first ever Marquee Trivia Online! To join this first edition, we’re asking for a suggested donation of $6 (or more!), and we’ll be donating all of the net proceeds to help support our friends at the Brattle Theatre while they’re closed down.

 

This online trivia night will be run through Zoom, select a payment level below click the button to pay and register for more technical details coming soon.

 

 


Register for trivia

Save the date! Our next trivia night is coming on March 5, back at the White Horse Tavern in Allston. Doors open at 6:30pm, and questions will begin at 7:30pm. We recommend getting there early to secure a good table!

This evening is being co-presented by the Boston Underground Film Festival. The winning team will receive a prize from the Festival.

location.address: White Horse Tavern, Brighton Avenue, Boston, MA, USA

acf.description: Save the date! Our third trivia night is coming on February 4th, back at the White Horse Tavern in Allston. With everyone’s favorite non-controversial awards show coming up, this month is focused on the Oscars: their near century-long history, that one time there was a streaker, and the occasionally acceptable choices. Join us for our night all about Hollywood’s biggest night!

location.address: White Horse Tavern, Brighton Avenue, Boston, MA, USA

acf.description:
Our second trivia night is coming on January 7th, back at the White Horse Tavern in Allston. We’ll be looking back at 2019, so now’s the time to start brushing up on box office stats or double check how many movies Keanu Reeves was in (it’s more than the two you’re thinking of). Doors will be at 7pm and questions will start at 7:30. We recommend getting there early to get a good table.

See you at trivia!

This event is being co-presented by The Brattle Theatre. The winning team will receive a prize from the theatre.

location.address: White Horse Tavern, Brighton Avenue, Boston, MA, USA

acf.description:
We’re excited to announce our Opening Night date and our venue! We’ll be at the White Horse Tavern in Allston on Thursday, December 5 for the first-ever Marquee Trivia. Come join us for movie marginalia, Oscars history, box office stats, and more! Doors open at 7:00pm, and questions will begin at 7:30pm. We recommend getting there early to secure a good table!

 

This event is co-presented by the Coolidge Corner Theatre; the winning team will receive six free passes to see a film at the theatre.

location.address: White Horse Tavern, Brighton Avenue, Boston, MA, USA
